accountSelectionRequired.message: You need to select an account!

addAcquiredTokens.message: Add the tokens you've acquired using DefiMask

attemptToCancelDescription.message: Submitting this attempt does not guarantee your original transaction will be cancelled. If the cancellation attempt is successful, you will be charged the transaction fee above.

balanceIsInsufficientGas.message: Insufficient balance for current gas total

betweenMinAndMax.description: helper for inputting hex as decimal input

builtInCalifornia.message: DefiMask is designed and built in California.

buyCoinbaseExplainer.message: Coinbase is the world’s most popular way to buy and sell Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin.

chromeRequiredForHardwareWallets.message: You need to use DefiMask on Google Chrome in order to connect to your Hardware Wallet.

clickToAdd.message: Click on $1 to add them to your account

copyPrivateKey.message: This is your private key (click to copy)

decimalsMustZerotoTen.message: Decimals must be at least 0, and not over 36.

defaultNetwork.message: The default network for Ether transactions is Main Net.

denExplainer.message: Your DEN is your password-encrypted storage within DefiMask.

depositBTC.message: Deposit your BTC to the address below:

depositShapeShiftExplainer.message: If you own other cryptocurrencies, you can trade and deposit Ether directly into your DefiMask wallet. No Account Needed.

directDepositEtherExplainer.message: If you already have some Ether, the quickest way to get Ether in your new wallet by direct deposit.

exportPrivateKeyWarning.message: Export private keys at your own risk.

fromToSame.message: From and To address cannot be the same

gasLimitCalculation.message: We calculate the suggested gas limit based on network success rates.

gasLimitTooLow.message: Gas limit must be at least 21000

gasPriceCalculation.message: We calculate the suggested gas prices based on network success rates.

getEtherFromFaucet.description: Displays network name for Ether faucet

greaterThanMin.description: helper for inputting hex as decimal input

here.description: as in -click here- for more information (goes with troubleTokenBalances)

holdEther.message: It allows you to hold ether & tokens, and serves as your bridge to decentralized applications.

howToDeposit.message: How would you like to deposit Ether?

import.description: Button to import an account from a selected file

importAccountMsg.message: Imported accounts will not be associated with your originally created DefiMask account seedphrase. Learn more about imported accounts

imported.description: status showing that an account has been fully loaded into the keyring

initialTransactionConfirmed.message: Your initial transaction was confirmed by the network. Click OK to go back.

jsonFail.message: Something went wrong. Please make sure your JSON file is properly formatted.

keepTrackTokens.message: Keep track of the tokens you’ve bought with your DefiMask account.

ledgerAccountRestriction.message: You need to make use your last account before you can add a new one.

lessThanMax.description: helper for inputting hex as decimal input

likeToAddTokens.message: Would you like to add these tokens?

loweCaseWords.message: seed words only have lowercase characters

metamaskDescription.message: DefiMask is a secure identity vault for Ethereum.

needEtherInWallet.message: To interact with decentralized applications using DefiMask, you’ll need Ether in your wallet.

needImportFile.description: User is important an account and needs to add a file to continue

needImportPassword.description: Password and file needed to import an account

negativeETH.message: Can not send negative amounts of ETH.

newAccountNumberName.description: Default name of next account to be created on create account screen

noAddressForName.message: No address has been set for this name.

noWebcamFound.message: Your computer's webcam was not found. Please try again.

onlySendToEtherAddress.message: Only send ETH to an Ethereum address.

onlySendTokensToAccountAddress.message: Only send $1 to an Ethereum account address.

or.description: choice between creating or importing a new account

orderOneHere.message: Order a Trezor or Ledger and keep your funds in cold storage

passwordCorrect.message: Please make sure your password is correct.

passwordMismatch.description: in password creation process, the two new password fields did not match

passwordShort.description: in password creation process, the password is not long enough to be secure

pastePrivateKey.message: Paste your private key string here:

personalAddressDetected.message: Personal address detected. Input the token contract address.

primaryCurrencySettingDescription.message: Select ETH to prioritize displaying values in ETH. Select Fiat to prioritize displaying values in your selected currency.

privateKey.description: select this type of file to use to import an account

privateKeyWarning.message: Warning: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private keys can steal any assets held in your account.

readdToken.message: You can add this token back in the future by going go to “Add token” in your accounts options menu.

rejectTxsDescription.message: You are about to batch reject $1 transactions.

removeAccountDescription.message: This account will be removed from your wallet. Please make sure you have the original seed phrase or private key for this imported account before continuing. You can import or create accounts again from the account drop-down.

resetAccountDescription.message: Resetting your account will clear your transaction history.

restoreAccountWithSeed.message: Restore your Account with Seed Phrase

retryWithMoreGas.message: Retry with a higher gas price here

revealSeedWordsDescription.message: If you ever change browsers or move computers, you will need this seed phrase to access your accounts. Save them somewhere safe and secret.

revealSeedWordsWarning.message: These words can be used to steal all your accounts.

revealSeedWordsWarningTitle.message: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone!

scanInstructions.message: Place the QR code in front of your camera

secretPhrase.message: Enter your secret twelve word phrase here to restore your vault.

selectPathHelp.message: If you don't see your existing Ledger accounts below, try switching paths to "Legacy (MEW / MyCrypto)"

sendTokensAnywhere.message: Send Tokens to anyone with an Ethereum account

separateEachWord.message: Separate each word with a single space

showHexDataDescription.message: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen

signNotice.message:
Signing this message can have 
dangerous side effects. Only sign messages from 
sites you fully trust with your entire account.
 This dangerous method will be removed in a future version.

spaceBetween.message: there can only be a space between words

speedUpSubtitle.message: Increase your gas price to attempt to overwrite and speed up your transaction

stateLogsDescription.message: State logs contain your public account addresses and sent transactions.

step1HardwareWalletMsg.message: Connect your hardware wallet directly to your computer.

step2HardwareWalletMsg.message: Select the account you want to view. You can only choose one at a time.

step3HardwareWalletMsg.message: Use your hardware account like you would with any Ethereum account. Log in to dApps, send Eth, buy and store ERC20 tokens and Non-Fungible tokens like CryptoKitties.

toETHviaShapeShift.description: system will fill in deposit type in start of message

tokenSelection.message: Search for tokens or select from our list of popular tokens.

tokenWarning1.message: Keep track of the tokens you’ve bought with your DefiMask account. If you bought tokens using a different account, those tokens will not appear here.

transactionCreated.message: Transaction created with a value of $1 on $2.

transactionError.message: Transaction Error. Exception thrown in contract code.

transactionUpdatedGas.message: Transaction updated with a gas price of $1 on $2.

twelveWords.message:
These 12 words are the only way to restore your DefiMask accounts.
Save them somewhere safe and secret.

uiWelcomeMessage.message: You are now using the new DefiMask UI.
